solution_line_template: He buys a plain croissant for ${regular_croissant_price} and an almond croissant for ${almond_croissant_price} for a total of ${regular_croissant_price} + ${almond_croissant_price} = $<<{regular_croissant_price}+{almond_croissant_price}={weekly_pastry_total}>>{weekly_pastry_total} on pastries per weekend
In one year, which is {weeks_per_year} weeks, he spends {weeks_per_year}*${weekly_pastry_total} = $<<{weeks_per_year}*{weekly_pastry_total}={yearly_pastry_total}>>{yearly_pastry_total} on pastries
